alert.note: Alert for Southern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 12 at 3:53PM EST until January 13 at 9:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Southern New London County. In New York, Northeast Suffolk and Southeast Suffolk Counties. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 9 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
